researchLinks.description: Abusing VPC Traffic Mirroring in AWS

securityImplications: Attackers might use CreateTrafficMirrorSession to initiate a session for mirroring network traffic, potentially for malicious monitoring or data exfiltration.
commandLineSimulation: aws ec2 create-traffic-mirror-session --description TrailDiscoverDescription --traffic-mirror-target-id tmt-07f75d8feeEXAMPLE --network-interface-id eni-070203f901EXAMPLE --session-number 1 --packet-length 25 --traffic-mirror-filter-id tmf-04812ff784EXAMPLE
